original: LINDSTRÖM, Bror Erie Harry, Kamrer, Sundsvall, f Sköns s :n 29/12 97 av köpm E L o Kristina Felldin, gm Jenny Burström. Hdlssk, språkstud. Anst h Alfr Lundqvists eftr 11—18, AB Andersson & Nordin 18, AB Fröberg & Sjöberg 19—20, Ivar Petterssons mo-torverkst sed. 20 (samtl Sdsv). Styr.led AB Automekan, Sdsv omnibusAB, traf.AB Hedin & Sjöström, fd AB Ivar P :ssons motorverkst o en av dettas likvidat, styr.led Hdlstjm.frbs lokalavd (fd Sdsv kont- o bitr.frn) sed. 28 (ordf 7 år). Stadsrev, i hamnstyr, huv.m sparbkn, suppl länsarb.nmdn. Resor: Norge 24, Tyskl, Holl 28, Danm 29, 32. Odd Fellow (skattm log 38), v. ordf RT Verdandi, TROs högsta utm.t, rev Medelpads IF, dipl mm fr öl idr.frb. Hobby: skriva vers.
translated: LINDSTRÖM, Bror Erie Harry, Clerk, Sundsvall, born in Skön parish on December 29th, 1897, to merchant E.L. and Kristina Felldin, married Jenny Burström. Business school, language studies. Employed at Alfr Lundqvist's company from 1911 to 1918, AB Andersson & Nordin in 1918, AB Fröberg & Sjöberg from 1919 to 1920, Ivar Pettersson's motor workshop from 1920 onwards (all in Sundsvall). Board member of AB Automekan, Sundsvall Omnibus AB, and Traffic AB Hedin & Sjöström. Former board member of AB Ivar Pettersson's motor workshop and one of its liquidators. Chairperson of the Trade Association's local branch in Sundsvall since 1928 (7 years as chairman). City auditor, member of the harbor board, principal at the savings bank, substitute member of the county labor board. Travels: Norway in 1924, Germany and the Netherlands in 1928, Denmark in 1929 and 1932. Member of Odd Fellow (treasurer of the lodge in 1938), vice chairman of RT Verdandi, holder of TRO's highest award, auditor of Medelpads IF, recipient of diplomas from various leisure organizations. Hobby: writing poetry.

structured.name: Bror Erie Harry Lindström
